Mon, 14 Oct 2024 00:54:10 +0000 Immigration Minister Erica Stanford met horticulture leaders here this week to discuss residency improvements to keep skilled workers in New Zealand. (From left) Bevan Rakoia (Pacific Island Community Trust), Leigh Anderson (Women in Horticulture), local MP Dana Kirkpatrick, Stanford, LeaderBrand's Gordon McPhail and Grant Walsh from First Fresh. Photo / Murray Robertson
